title: Finding True Peace and Prosperity
itunes:author: Guests: Chuck & Ann Bentley
itunes:summary:
Having financial goals as a couple can greatly bless your marriage. The key is to get on the same page as a team. John and Greg share how to work together as a team and find contentment in your financial situation as a couple. Featuring Mr. Chuck and Mrs. Ann Bentley.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Chuck and Ann Bentley's book "Money Problems, Marriage Solutions" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-11-30?refcd=1292601

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/finding-true-peace-and-prosperity/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
